Plot: A sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a very unusual fashion when he acquires a new kind of programming for his station.
Title: Videodrome
Actors: James Woods, Sonja Smits, Debbie Harry, Peter Dvorsky
tomatoConsensus: Visually audacious, disorienting, and just plain weird, Videodrome's musings on technology, entertainment, and politics still feel fresh today.
